title: List of things named after Leonhard Euler
summary: In mathematics and physics, many topics are named in honor of Swiss mathematician Leonhard Euler (1707â€“1783), who made many important discoveries and innovations. Many of these items named after Euler include their own unique function, equation, formula, identity, number (single or sequence), or other mathematical entity. Many of these entities have been given simple and ambiguous names such as Euler's function, Euler's equation, and Euler's formula.
